entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
